long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I'm a Digital/Online Growth Consultant. I help small small business owners find, connect, and gain new paying customers over the web! I do that by providing products (software, plugins, scripts through popular internet marketplaces such as JVZoo, W+, and Clickbank as both a vendor and as an affiliate marketer) along with services (I offer the best Web Development , Web Design , SEO , Social Media , and Reputation Management Internet Marketing Consultant Agency in Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada).

Considering my diverse background as a certified network administrator, a former programmer for a small multimedia company, a freelancer, web hosting provider, and an internet marketer, what sets me apart from others is that I give true value in the form of honest in-depth product reviews instead of just uninformed opinion.
